title: Paravortices: loop braid representations with both generators involutive
summary:
We first motivate the study of a certain quotient of the loop braid category, both for the mathematics underpinning recent approaches to topological quantum computation; and as a key example in non-semisimple higher representation theory. For reasons that will become clear, we call this quotient the mixed doubles category, $MD$. Then our main result is a theorem classifying all mixed doubles representations in rank-2.
  Each representation yields a mixed doubles group representation for every loop braid group $LB_n$, and we are able to analyse the unified linear representation theory of many of these sequences of representations, using a mixture of very classical, classical, and new techniques. In particular this is a motivating example for the `glue' generalisation of charge-conserving representation theory (a form of rigid higher non-semisimplicity) introduced recently.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究环辫范畴的特定商——混合双重范畴，并分类了其秩-2表示，为拓扑量子计算和非半单高阶表示论提供数学基础。
AI.motivation: 研究环辫范畴的特定商有两个主要动机：一是为拓扑量子计算的最新方法提供数学基础；二是作为非半单高阶表示论的关键示例。
AI.method: 通过分析混合双重范畴的表示，结合经典、半经典和新技术，统一研究环辫群序列的线性表示理论，特别是应用"胶合"推广的电荷守恒表示理论。
AI.result: 主要结果是分类了混合双重范畴在秩-2下的所有表示，每个表示都对应每个环辫群LB_n的混合双重群表示。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为拓扑量子计算提供了数学基础，同时展示了非半单高阶表示论中"胶合"推广表示理论的应用价值，是刚性高阶非半单性的重要示例。

title: Cartan subproduct systems
summary:
Given a semisimple compact Lie group $G$ and a nonzero dominant integral weight $λ$, the highest weight $G_q$-modules $V_{nλ}$ form a subproduct system of finite dimensional Hilbert spaces. Using a conjectural asymptotic behavior of Clebsch-Gordan coefficients we identify the corresponding Cuntz-Pimsner algebras with algebras of quantized functions on homogeneous spaces of $G$. We also show that the gauge-invariant part of the Toeplitz algebra provides a model for convergence of full matrix algebras to quantum flag manifolds, complementing and generalizing results of Landsman and Rieffel for $q=1$ and results of Vaes-Vergnioux in the rank one case for $q\ne1$.
  We verify our conjecture on Clebsch-Gordan coefficients for $G=SU(n)$ and all weights that are either regular or multiples of the fundamental weight $ω_1$. For $λ=ω_1$, we also provide a detailed description of the Toeplitz and Cuntz-Pimsner algebras, generalizing results of Arveson on symmetric subproduct systems.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究半单紧李群G的最高权G_q-模V_{nλ}构成的子积系统，通过Clebsch-Gordan系数的渐近行为，将对应的Cuntz-Pimsner代数与齐次空间上的量子函数代数等同，并证明Toeplitz代数的规范不变部分为量子旗流形收敛提供模型。
AI.motivation: 研究半单紧李群G的最高权G_q-模构成的子积系统，旨在建立Cuntz-Pimsner代数与量子齐次空间函数代数之间的联系，并为量子旗流形的收敛提供数学模型。
AI.method: 使用最高权G_q-模V_{nλ}构成的子积系统，基于Clebsch-Gordan系数的渐近行为猜想，将Cuntz-Pimsner代数与量子齐次空间函数代数等同，并分析Toeplitz代数的规范不变部分。
AI.result: 对于G=SU(n)且权重为正则或基本权ω_1倍数的情况，验证了Clebsch-Gordan系数猜想；对于λ=ω_1，详细描述了Toeplitz和Cuntz-Pimsner代数，推广了Arveson关于对称子积系统的结果。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了量子群表示论与算子代数之间的联系，为量子旗流形的收敛提供了算子代数模型，推广了Landsman-Rieffel(q=1)和Vaes-Vergnioux(秩1情况)的结果。

title: The center of the BMW algebras and an Okounkov-Vershik like approach
summary: We use the Jucys-Murphy elements of the BMW algebra to show that its center over the complex numbers for almost all parameters making it semisimple is given by Wheel Laurent polynomials, a subalgebra of the symmetric Laurent polynomials in the JM elements. As an application, we give an Okounkov-Vershik like approach to its finite dimensional representations. In the non semisimple case related to the type B Lie algebras, the central subalgebra of Wheel Laurent polynomials is large enough to separate blocks of the BMW algebras.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在复数域上，对于几乎所有使BMW代数半单的参数，其中心由Wheel Laurent多项式给出，这是JM元素对称Laurent多项式的一个子代数。作为应用，提出了类似Okounkov-Vershik的方法来处理其有限维表示。在非半单情况下，Wheel Laurent多项式中心子代数足够大以分离BMW代数的块。
AI.motivation: 研究BMW代数的中心结构，特别是在半单和非半单参数情况下的中心描述，这对于理解BMW代数的表示理论和块分解具有重要意义。
AI.method: 使用BMW代数的Jucys-Murphy元素，证明在复数域上对于几乎所有使代数半单的参数，其中心由Wheel Laurent多项式给出。在非半单情况下，分析Wheel Laurent多项式中心子代数对块分离的作用。
AI.result: 证明了BMW代数的中心在几乎所有半单参数情况下由Wheel Laurent多项式描述，这是JM元素对称Laurent多项式的一个子代数。在非半单情况下，该中心子代数足够大以分离BMW代数的块。
AI.conclusion: BMW代数的中心结构可以通过Wheel Laurent多项式精确描述，这为研究其表示理论提供了新工具，特别是类似Okounkov-Vershik的方法可以应用于其有限维表示的研究。

title: A geometric realization of liftings of Cartan type
summary: We introduce a novel approach to compute liftings of bosonizations of Nichols algebras of diagonal braided vector spaces of Cartan type which replaces heavy computations with structural maps related to quantum groups. This provides an answer to a question posed by Andruskiewitsch and Schneider, who classified finite-dimensional complex pointed Hopf algebras over finite abelian groups whose order is coprime with 210. As application and in order to give not-too-technical examples, we recover with our method the liftings of type $A_{n}$ computed by Andruskiewitsch and Schneider, of type $B_2$ computed by Beattie, Dascalescu and Raianu, and of type $B_3$ computed by the authors, for Drinfeld-Jimbo type braidings. Moreover, we present all liftings of type $B_θ$ and $D_θ$, for $θ\geq 2$, giving in this way new explicit infinite families of liftings for Drinfeld-Jimbo type braidings.

AI.tldr: 本文提出了一种计算Cartan型对角辫向量空间的Nichols代数的玻色化提升的新方法，用与量子群相关的结构映射替代了繁重的计算，解决了Andruskiewitsch和Schneider提出的问题。
AI.motivation: 解决Andruskiewitsch和Schneider提出的关于有限维复点Hopf代数分类的问题，他们分类了阶与210互质的有限阿贝尔群上的有限维复点Hopf代数。需要一种更高效的方法来计算玻色化提升。
AI.method: 引入一种新颖的方法，用与量子群相关的结构映射来替代繁重的计算，从而计算Cartan型对角辫向量空间的Nichols代数的玻色化提升。该方法提供了更结构化的计算框架。
AI.result: 成功恢复了之前已知的A_n、B_2、B_3型提升，并首次给出了B_θ和D_θ型（θ≥2）的所有提升，为Drinfeld-Jimbo型辫子提供了新的显式无限族提升。
AI.conclusion: 该方法不仅回答了Andruskiewitsch和Schneider提出的问题，还提供了计算玻色化提升的高效工具，能够生成新的无限族提升，扩展了对Hopf代数结构的理解。

title: Double Yangian, Factorization, and qKZ-equation for Cotangent Lie Algebras
summary: In this paper, we construct the dual $Y^*_\hbar(\mathfrak d)$ and double $DY_\hbar (\mathfrak d)$ of the Yangian $Y_\hbar (\mathfrak d)$ associated with a cotangent Lie algebra $\mathfrak d=T^*\mathfrak g$. We define a coherent factorization algebra version of the dual Yangian $Y_\hbar^*(\mathfrak d)^{\mathrm{co-op}}$ with opposite coproduct. Furthermore, we define a quantum vertex algebra structure on the quantum vacuum module $V_{\hbar,k}(\mathfrak d)$ of central extensions $\widehat{DY}_{\hbar,\ell} (\mathfrak d)$ of this double Yangian and show that its conformal blocks satisfy quantum KZ equations. We discuss examples of $\mathfrak d$ that arise from 3d $N=4$ gauge theories via the work of Costello-Gaiotto. These examples include Takiff Lie algebras $T^*\mathfrak g$, whose affine VOA is a large subalgebra of the chiral differential operator algebra of $G$, as well as the smallest type-A Lie superalgebra $\mathfrak{gl} (1|1)$.

AI.tldr: 本文构建了与余切李代数相关的Yangian的对偶和双重结构，定义了量子顶点代数结构，并证明其共形块满足量子KZ方程，讨论了来自3d N=4规范理论的例子。
AI.motivation: 研究余切李代数相关的Yangian代数结构，探索其在量子场论和共形场论中的应用，特别是与3d N=4规范理论的联系。
AI.method: 构造Yangian的对偶Y*_ħ(𝔡)和双重DY_ħ(𝔡)结构，定义具有相反余积的相干分解代数版本，在量子真空模上定义量子顶点代数结构，并证明其共形块满足量子KZ方程。
AI.result: 成功构建了Yangian的对偶和双重结构，建立了量子顶点代数与量子KZ方程的联系，并提供了来自3d N=4规范理论的具体例子，包括Takiff李代数和𝔤𝔩(1|1)李超代数。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了Yangian代数、量子顶点代数和量子KZ方程之间的深刻联系，为理解3d N=4规范理论的代数结构提供了新的数学框架。

title: Spectral torsion of the internal noncommutative geometry of the Standard Model
comment: Third version, implemented more comments, 24 pages
summary: We compute the nonvanishing spectral torsion functional of the internal part of the noncommutative geometry behind the Standard Model. We show that with a suitable modification of the usual differential graded calculus it matches an analogous functional constructed in terms of the connection. We study also the impact of the torsion on the other spectral fuctionals, which correspond to geometric invariants such as volume integral, metric and Einstein tensors, and scalar curvature. We discuss the impact of the SM Yukawa couplings and the Majorana mass matrix on our results.

AI.tldr: 该论文计算了标准模型背后非交换几何内部部分的非零谱挠率泛函，通过修改微分分级代数使其与基于联络的类似泛函匹配，并研究了挠率对其他谱泛函（如体积积分、度规、爱因斯坦张量和标量曲率）的影响。
AI.motivation: 研究标准模型非交换几何中的谱挠率泛函，探索如何通过修改微分分级代数使其与联络构造的泛函相匹配，并分析挠率对几何不变量的影响。
AI.method: 计算非交换几何内部部分的非零谱挠率泛函，通过修改通常的微分分级代数，使其与基于联络构造的类似泛函相匹配，并系统研究挠率对其他谱泛函的影响。
AI.result: 成功计算了标准模型非交换几何的谱挠率泛函，通过合适的微分分级代数修改实现了与联络构造泛函的匹配，分析了挠率对体积积分、度规、爱因斯坦张量和标量曲率等几何不变量的影响。
AI.conclusion: 标准模型非交换几何中的谱挠率泛函可以通过修改微分分级代数与联络构造的泛函相匹配，挠率对几何不变量有重要影响，且标准模型的Yukawa耦合和Majorana质量矩阵对结果有显著贡献。

title: Grothendieck--Teichmüller Symmetries of Cyclic Operads and Tangles
comment: Revisions to exposition, including the reorganization of some preliminaries to improve readability. Figures added and two proofs expanded to include further clarifying details
summary: We characterise the profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller group $\widehat{\mathsf{GT}}$ as the group of automorphisms of the profinite completion of a cyclic operad of parenthesised ribbon braids. This operad generates a symmetric monoidal category which is equivalent to the category of framed, oriented tangles, thereby providing an operadic model for profinite tangles and their arithmetic symmetries. As applications, we show that $\widehat{\mathsf{GT}}$ acts naturally on tangles and provide an alternative proof of the formality of the cyclic framed little disks operad.

AI.tldr: 该论文将profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller群刻画为带括号带状辫子的profinite完备化循环operad的自同构群，建立了operadic模型来描述profinite扭结及其算术对称性。
AI.motivation: 研究profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller群与扭结理论之间的联系，为profinite扭结及其算术对称性提供operadic模型，深化对扭结算术性质的理解。
AI.method: 通过构造带括号带状辫子的循环operad的profinite完备化，证明其自同构群与profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller群同构，并建立与带框架定向扭结范畴的等价关系。
AI.result: 成功将profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller群刻画为特定operad的自同构群，证明了该群自然作用于扭结，并提供了循环带框架小圆盘operad形式化的替代证明。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了profinite Grothendieck-Teichmüller群与扭结理论之间的operadic联系，为理解扭结的算术对称性提供了新的理论框架，并展示了在形式化证明中的应用价值。

title: Heat semigroups on quantum automorphism groups of finite dimensional C*-algebras
summary: In this paper, we investigate heat semigroups on a quantum automorphism group ${\rm Aut}^+(B)$ of a finite dimensional C*-algebra $B$ and its Plancherel trace. We show ultracontractivity, hypercontractivity, and the spectral gap inequality of the heat semigroups on ${\rm Aut}^+(B)$. Furthermore, we obtain the sharpness of the Sobolev embedding property and the Hausdorff-Young inequality of ${\rm Aut}^+(B)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了有限维C*-代数B的量子自同构群Aut⁺(B)上的热半群及其Plancherel迹，证明了热半群的超压缩性、超收缩性和谱隙不等式，并获得了Sobolev嵌入性质和Hausdorff-Young不等式的尖锐性结果。
AI.motivation: 研究量子自同构群上的热半群性质，探索量子群上的分析工具，为量子群上的调和分析提供理论基础。
AI.method: 使用Plancherel迹和热半群方法，在量子自同构群上建立分析框架，证明各种不等式和性质。
AI.result: 证明了热半群的超压缩性、超收缩性和谱隙不等式，获得了Sobolev嵌入性质和Hausdorff-Young不等式的尖锐性结果。
AI.conclusion: 在量子自同构群上成功建立了热半群理论，为量子群上的调和分析提供了重要工具和结果。

title: Multispecies inhomogeneous $t$-PushTASEP from antisymmetric fusion
comment: 24 pages, 6 figures, minor improvements, dedicated to the memory of Rodney James Baxter, final version
summary: We investigate the recently introduced inhomogeneous $n$-species $t$-PushTASEP, a long-range stochastic process on a periodic lattice. A Baxter-type formula is established, expressing the Markov matrix as an alternating sum of commuting transfer matrices over all the fundamental representations of $U_t(\widehat{sl}_{n+1})$. This superposition acts as an inclusion-exclusion principle, selectively extracting the sequential particle transitions characteristic of the PushTASEP, while canceling forbidden channels. The homogeneous specialization connects the PushTASEP to ASEP, showing that the two models share eigenstates and a common integrability structure.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了非均匀n物种t-PushTASEP模型，建立了Baxter型公式，将马尔可夫矩阵表示为U_t(widehat{sl}_{n+1})所有基本表示上交换转移矩阵的交替和，揭示了该模型与ASEP的共性。
AI.motivation: 研究最近引入的非均匀n物种t-PushTASEP模型，这是一种周期格点上的长程随机过程，旨在建立其数学结构和与其他模型的联系。
AI.method: 建立了Baxter型公式，将马尔可夫矩阵表示为U_t(widehat{sl}_{n+1})量子代数所有基本表示上交换转移矩阵的交替和。这种叠加作用类似于容斥原理，选择性提取PushTASEP特有的顺序粒子跃迁，同时消除禁止通道。
AI.result: 通过齐次特化将PushTASEP与ASEP联系起来，证明这两个模型共享本征态和共同的完全可积结构，揭示了它们之间的深层数学联系。
AI.conclusion: 非均匀n物种t-PushTASEP具有丰富的代数结构，通过Baxter型公式建立了与量子代数表示理论的联系，并揭示了该模型与ASEP在可积性结构上的共性。

title: Derived representations of quantum character varieties
comment: v2: 56 pages, 11 of which are appendices. Introduction improved, assumptions weakened in section 5.1.2, results unchanged. Final version, accepted in Commun. Math. Phys
summary: Quantum moduli algebras $\mathcal{L}_{g,n}^{\mathrm{inv}}(H)$ were introduced by Alekseev-Grosse-Schomerus and Buffenoir-Roche in the context of quantization of character varieties of surfaces and exist for any quasitriangular Hopf algebra $H$. In this paper we construct representations of $\mathcal{L}_{g,n}^{\mathrm{inv}}(H)$ on cohomology spaces $\mathrm{Ext}_H^m(X,M)$ for all $m \geq 0$, where $X$ is any $H$-module and $M$ is any $\mathcal{L}_{g,n}(H)$-module endowed with a compatible $H$-module structure. As a corollary and under suitable assumptions on $H$, we obtain projective representations of mapping class groups of surfaces on such Ext spaces. This recovers the projective representations constructed by Lentner-Mierach-Schweigert-Sommerhäuser from Lyubashenko theory, when the category $\mathcal{C} = H\text{-}\mathrm{mod}$ is used in their construction. Other topological applications are matrix-valued invariants of knots in thickened surfaces and representations of skein algebras on Ext spaces.

AI.tldr: 该论文为量子模代数在Ext空间上构造了表示，并获得了映射类群的射影表示、曲面加厚中纽结的矩阵值不变量，以及Ext空间上的绞线代数表示。
AI.motivation: 量子模代数 $\mathcal{L}_{g,n}^{\mathrm{inv}}(H)$ 在曲面特征簇的量子化背景下被引入，但需要研究其在更广泛数学结构上的表示理论。作者旨在为这些代数在Ext空间上构造表示，从而获得拓扑应用。
AI.method: 对于任意拟三角Hopf代数$H$，在任意$H$-模$X$和具有兼容$H$-模结构的$\mathcal{L}_{g,n}(H)$-模$M$的Ext空间$\mathrm{Ext}_H^m(X,M)$上构造$\mathcal{L}_{g,n}^{\mathrm{inv}}(H)$的表示。在$H$的适当假设下，进一步获得曲面映射类群的射影表示。
AI.result: 成功构造了量子模代数在Ext空间上的表示，并作为推论获得了映射类群的射影表示。这些结果恢复了Lentner-Mierach-Schweigert-Sommerhäuser通过Lyubashenko理论构造的射影表示。此外还获得了曲面加厚中纽结的矩阵值不变量，以及Ext空间上的绞线代数表示。
AI.conclusion: 该工作建立了量子模代数表示理论与同调代数之间的联系，为拓扑量子场论和低维拓扑提供了新的代数工具和应用，特别是在曲面特征簇的量子化背景下。

title: Non-semisimple Crane-Yetter theory varying over the character stack
comment: v3: Updates to the introduction. Corrections around 3.18, 3.19 and where these are used. v2: Important corrections made throughout sections 3.1 and 3.3. Other updates to literature and presentation throughout. v1: Comments welcome!
summary: We construct a relative version of the Crane-Yetter topological quantum field theory in four dimensions, from non-semisimple data. Our theory is defined relative to the classical $G$-gauge theory in five dimensions -- this latter theory assigns to each manifold $M$ the appropriate linearization of the moduli stack of $G$-local systems, called the character stack. Our main result is to establish a relative invertibility property for our construction. This invertibility generalizes the key invertibility property of the original Crane-Yetter theory which allowed it to capture the framing anomaly of the celebrated Witten-Reshetikhin-Turaev theory. In particular our invertibilty statement at the level of surfaces implies a categorical, stacky version of the unicity theorem for skein algebras; at the level of 3-manifolds it equips the character stack with a canonical line bundle. Regarded as a topological symmetry defect of classical gauge theory, our work establishes invertibility of this defect by a gauging procedure.

AI.tldr: 本文构建了四维Crane-Yetter拓扑量子场论的相对版本，基于非半单数据，相对于五维经典G-规范理论，并建立了相对可逆性性质。
AI.motivation: 构建相对版本的Crane-Yetter拓扑量子场论，使其相对于五维经典G-规范理论，旨在推广原始Crane-Yetter理论的关键可逆性性质，以捕捉Witten-Reshetikhin-Turaev理论的框架异常。
AI.method: 使用非半单数据构造四维相对Crane-Yetter拓扑量子场论，将其定义为相对于五维经典G-规范理论，该经典理论将流形M映射到G-局部系统模栈的适当线性化（特征栈）。
AI.result: 建立了构造的相对可逆性性质，该性质在曲面层面意味着skein代数的范畴化、栈化唯一性定理，在三维流形层面为特征栈配备了一个典范线丛，并作为经典规范理论的拓扑对称缺陷，通过规范过程确立了该缺陷的可逆性。
AI.conclusion: 成功构建了相对Crane-Yetter拓扑量子场论并证明了其相对可逆性，这一结果推广了原始理论的关键性质，在曲面和三维流形层面都有重要应用，并为经典规范理论提供了可逆的拓扑对称缺陷。
